arts.ttl: “Plenty of positives” | West Ham unlucky not to beat Bournemouth
arts.sum: West Ham find themselves unlucky not to walk away with all three points after an impressive second-half against Bournemouth. Although they have next to nothing to play for this season, the remaining games are absolutely vital to Graham Potter. Not only does it give him a chance to experiment with different tactics but it also... The post “Plenty of positives” | West Ham unlucky not to beat Bournemouth appeared first on The West Ham Way.

arts.ttl: Evanilson stars as Cherries draw with West Ham: Player ratings
arts.sum: The Cherries picked up a point at the London Stadium on Saturday, after Evanilson equalised with 11 minutes to play to complete his brace.

arts.ttl: Marco Silva pays tribute to Liverpool star Andy Robertson amid Milos Kerkez transfer links
arts.sum: Liverpool are understood to be eyeing a summer transfer swoop for Bournemouth left-back Milos Kerkez but Marco Silva has been full of praise for his former player Andy Robertson, who shone under his tutelage at Hull City

arts.ttl: Evanilson double rescues draw for Bournemouth at West Ham
arts.sum: The result sees West Ham, who have themselves gone four top-flight matches without a win, edge up to 15th in the table, while Bournemouth move up one place and into ninth position on 45 points. Graham Potter had urged his players to show more dynamism in attack and an improved competitive spirit in their quest to climb up the Premier League table, but the Hammers head coach had to wait until well after the break to see his side trouble Bournemouth after a lacklustre opening period.

arts.ttl: Andy Carroll's shocking Bordeaux salary is revealed, with ex-Liverpool and West Ham striker taking home 'LESS than France's minimum wage'
arts.sum: Striker Carroll's modest deal reflects Bordeaux's current financial struggles. The six-time French champions were forcibly relegated to the National 2 after declaring bankruptcy last year.

arts.ttl: Graham Potter admits West Ham did not deserve more than their Bournemouth draw
arts.sum: The Cherries headed back to the south coast with a point.

arts.ttl: West Ham United 2-2 Bournemouth: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Evanilson rescues Iraola's Cherries in dramatic clash
arts.sum: Bournemouth's dream took a blow when Andoni Iraola's side drew 2-2 with Graham Potter's West Ham United at the London Stadium on Saturday afternoon in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Evanilson scores twice to earn Bournemouth draw at West Ham
arts.sum: Niclas Fullkrug and Jarrod Bowen looked to have answered their manager’s rallying cry to not let the season fizzle out with second-half goals.
